p.s: The newspaper article Hope of escape lost in translation by Zia Haider Rahman was published on 17th December 2016 in The Sunday Times.
It is about learning English and celebrating difference and shows the opinion of the author pretty clear by some of his arguments and examples of own experiences.
He thinks very positive about this topic but also that we are not handelinghandling it right.
He even had to learn how to speak English and now he's searching for the best way of doing it for any immigrants.
